content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'rio')  

    CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [rio]  

    WITH ( 

        LOCATION   = 'https://navispowerbidatastorage2.dfs.core.windows.net/rio',  

    ) 

Go 



create or ALTER  view  laden_unladen
as
select *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/laden_unladen',
        data_source = 'rio',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [laden_unladen];


create or ALTER  view  move_history
as
select *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/move',
        data_source = 'mundra_ct04',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [move_history];

create or ALTER  view  decking_history
as
select *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/decking',
        data_source = 'mundra_ct04',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [decking_history];

create or ALTER  view  violation
as
select *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/violation',
        data_source = 'mundra_ct04',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [violation];

create or ALTER view dual_cycling
as
select *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/dual_cycling',
        data_source = 'mundra_ct04',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [dual_cycling];

create or ALTER view dual_cycling_yard_test
as
select *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/dual_cycling_yard_test',
        data_source = 'sgtd',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [dual_cycling_yard_test];

create view load_time_delta
as
select *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/load_time_delta',
        data_source = 'rio',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [load_time_delta];

create view dsch_time_delta
as
select *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/dsch_time_delta',
        data_source = 'rio',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [dsch_time_delta];

create view jobstep
as
select *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/jobstep',
        data_source = 'rio',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [jobstep];

create view rehandle_test
as
select *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/rehandle_test',
        data_source = 'sgtd',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [rehandle_test];

create view tt_productivity_test
as
select *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/tt_productivity_test',
        data_source = 'sgtd',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [tt_productivity_test];

create view section_confirmity
as
select *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/section_conformity',
        data_source = 'agct',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [section_confirmity];
